Articles.Content:
2 hours ago, blackrack said:

Like to share it? Yeah feel free to post it, if it's a big one spoiler it.

May I ask,when will the free version  releases?

48 minutes ago, jebycheek said:

May I ask,when will the free version  releases?

There isn't a specific release date at this time. I feel like we're testing blackracks patience constantly asking them, lol.

1 minute ago, ElonsMusk said:

There isn't a specific release date at this time

It will be done when it is done. Let the universe unfold as it will in a time of its own choosing.
Ohhh I'm going to have so much fun with this tonight. You got yourself a new patron, dude.  Seriously incredible work.
Really wicked work, I've already offered my feedback as far as it working in VR goes, and I trust  JonnyOThan to fix that up.  Excellent job!

This is truly amazing, thanks for all the work

I only have this small issue that is very fast spinning flicker on all planets with an atmosphere,  when looking at the map view during flight. What could cause this ?

 

Edited January 15, 2023 by Sydd
imgur wrong link

36 minutes ago, Sydd said:

This is truly amazing, thanks for all the work

I only have this small issue that is very fast spinning flicker on all planets with an atmosphere,  when looking at the map view during flight. What could cause this ?

 

Z-fighting, what does your GameData folder look like? Possibly TAA from TUFX or a conflicting cloud config.

Edited January 15, 2023 by blackrack

34 minutes ago, blackrack said:

Z-fighting, what does your GameData folder look like? Possibly TAA from TUFX or a conflicting cloud config.

There's lot of parts mod, and TUFX indeed, with Parallax. I'll try a clean install and add those one by one and report back

I installed your latest version by deleting my previous EVE, Scatterer and Spectra folders, and pasting your RaymarchedVolumetricsEarlyAccess in GameData

 

EDIT: It's TUFX, thank you

23 minutes ago, Tez613 said:

I am assuming this so correct me if I'm wrong, but this will break any planet packs that have their own cloud configs and stuff correct?

No, it's retrocompatible, the old configs will all continue to work exactly as they do now, with the old volumetrics and everything. And they can coexist with other planets using the new effects.
Oh that's awesome! thanks for letting me know!
Is there anyway to get this working with RSS?

Fantasic work @blackrack. I can't believe how smooth it runs and awesome it looks, truly impressed. 

Here my video:

 

Edited January 16, 2023 by Space Scumbag

36 minutes ago, Space Scumbag said:

Fantasic work @blackrack. I can't belive how smooth it runs and looks, trully impressed.

Here my video:

 

Thanks for the showcase! I really liked the Eve part especially

Edited January 16, 2023 by blackrack
Sorry, i have a question. How do I install this mode? Would really appreciate any help.

4 hours ago, Keapr1n said:

Sorry, i have a question. How do I install this mode? Would really appreciate any help.

Patreon, join and download, or wait until BR releases for free on Github / Stardock.

On 1/14/2023 at 2:00 PM, TruthfulGnome said:

I am in KSRSS, pretty jank setup but it looks great. I assume RSS might be harder

Howd you get that working?
Made a video showing how good KSP can look in RSS/RO with raymarched clouds and 6K downscaled resolution. There is only up from here!
will the volumetric clouds run with a rx 570?

33 minutes ago, Nonax said:

will the volumetric clouds run with a rx 570?

I'm not sure what kind of performance that has, but they work relatively fine on my laptop's MX 150. Framerate's kinda low with default settings but it was already kinda low so it's not a ton worse

38 minutes ago, WarriorSabe said:

I'm not sure what kind of performance that has, but they work relatively fine on my laptop's MX 150. Framerate's kinda low with default settings but it was already kinda low so it's not a ton worse

How was performance relative to standard EVE? I'm running a 750 Ti rn

12 minutes ago, Emilius73 said:

How was performance relative to standard EVE? I'm running a 750 Ti rn

Something like 60-70% of the framerate, on average. That's with the included configs and default settings, I'm sure better could be achieved by lowering the settings or using less intensive cloud configs
Will the full release work for the KSP version prior to the Mun arch change? Sorry im just debating if I should update my mods and install before this comes out.

5 hours ago, Motokid600 said:

Will the full release work for the KSP version prior to the Mun arch change? Sorry im just debating if I should update my mods and install before this comes out.

It should for a few versions back, normally up to 1.9.x

Is there a way to fix this? I'm on KSRSS, which I figure will be blamed
